title: Register your new business with HMRC

details.description: Register your new business with HM Revenue & Customs in 1 transaction - Self Assessment, VAT, Corporation Tax, PAYE for employers, HMRC
details.alternative_title: Register for Self Assessment, PAYE for employers, VAT and Corporation Tax
details.more_information:
You can register for:

- Self Assessment if you're a new sole trader or the 'nominated partner' in a new self-employed partnership
- Corporation Tax if you've set up a new limited company
- PAYE for employers if you're taking on staff
- VAT as a new business

^You can't use this service if you're setting up a limited liability partnership or you're not the 'nominated partner' in a self-employed business partnership. There are also a few other situations when you'll need to register a different way. [Find out more](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/online/new.htm#2 "Register for HMRC taxes"){:rel="external"} on the HMRC website.^


*[VAT]: Value Added Tax
*[HMRC]: HM Revenue & Customs
*[PAYE]: Pay As You Earn
details.introduction: Register your new business with HM Revenue & Customs (HMRC) and create your HMRC online account at the same time.

details.description: Includes Self Assessment, self-employment and starting a business
Information about starting up and running a business in the UK, including help if you're self employed or a sole trader.
